signIn.title: Sign in
signIn.subtitle: Enter your email and password below
signIn.termsPrefix: By clicking sign in, you agree to our

validation.usernameOrEmailRequired: Please enter your username or email
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters long

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account settings and set e-mail preferences.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: This is how others will see you on the site.
profile.firstNameDescription: Your first name as it appears on official documents.
profile.lastNameDescription: Your last name or family name.
profile.usernameDescription: This is your unique identifier. It can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores.
profile.emailDescription: Your email address is used for account recovery and important notifications. Contact support to change your email.
profile.phoneDescription: Your phone number for account verification and notifications.
profile.regionDescription: The region where you are located.
profile.cityDescription: The city where you are located.
profile.bioPlaceholder: Tell us a little bit about yourself
profile.bioDescription: A short bio about yourself. This will be visible to others.
profile.additionalSettingsDescription: Manage more detailed settings in the dedicated sections:
profile.accountSettingsHint: Update your language, timezone, and date of birth in
profile.displaySettingsHint: Configure date format and currency in
profile.notificationsSettingsHint: Manage email and push notifications in

validation.firstNameMinLength: First name must be at least 2 characters.
validation.firstNameMaxLength: First name must not be longer than 30 characters.
validation.lastNameMinLength: Last name must be at least 2 characters.
validation.lastNameMaxLength: Last name must not be longer than 30 characters.
validation.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters.
validation.usernameMaxLength: Username must not be longer than 20 characters.
validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.
validation.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number.
validation.bioMaxLength: Bio must not be longer than 500 characters.

account.title: Account
account.description: Update your account settings. Set your preferred language and timezone.
account.name: Name
account.nameDescription: This is the name that will be displayed on your profile and in emails.
account.dobDescription: Your date of birth is used to calculate your age.
account.languageDescription: This is the language that will be used in the dashboard.

validation.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters.
validation.nameMaxLength: Name must not be longer than 30 characters.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize the appearance of the app. Automatically switch between day and night themes.
appearance.fontDescription: Set the font you want to use in the dashboard.
appearance.themeDescription: Select the theme for the dashboard.

email.title: Email Notifications
email.newMessagesDescription: Get notified when you receive new messages.
email.taskRemindersDescription: Get reminded about upcoming tasks and deadlines.
email.financialAlertsDescription: Get notified about payments, invoices, and financial updates.

push.title: Push Notifications
push.description: Manage your push notification preferences for mobile devices.
push.enabledDescription: Receive push notifications on your mobile device.

inApp.title: In-App Notifications
inApp.soundDescription: Play a sound when you receive notifications.
inApp.desktopDescription: Show desktop notifications even when the app is in the background.

display.title: Display
display.description: Turn items on or off to control what's displayed in the app.
display.dateFormatDescription: Select how dates should be displayed throughout the dashboard.
display.timeFormatDescription: Select how time should be displayed.
display.currencyDescription: Select the currency for financial information.
display.startOfWeekDescription: Select the first day of the week for calendar displays.
display.compactModeDescription: Reduce spacing and padding throughout the dashboard for a more compact layout.

tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.description: Here's a list of your tasks for this month!

users.title: User List
users.description: Manage your users and their roles here.

404.title: Oops! Page Not Found!
404.description: It seems like the page you're looking for
404.descriptionContinued: does not exist or might have been removed.

cases.title: Cases & Litigation Files
cases.subtitle: You have

cases.uploadDocumentDescription: Select the file and document type to upload
cases.judgmentBucketInfo: The judgment will be saved in the encrypted judgments storage
cases.generalBucketInfo: The document will be saved in secure storage
cases.addClaimDescription: Add a new claim to the case

form.showOnCalendarDescription: Display this document as an event in the calendar

tags.deleteTagWarning: This tag is used {{count}} time(s) and will be removed from all associated entities.

documents.title: Document Management
documents.description: Upload and manage documents and files
documents.uploadDocumentDescription: Upload a new document to the system
documents.confidentialHelp: Mark document as confidential to restrict access
documents.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
documents.deleteVersionsWarning: All versions ({{count}}) of this document will be deleted.
documents.dragOrClick: Drag file here or click to select
documents.firstVersion: This is the first version of the document

followups.pageDescription: Track and manage follow-ups with clients and cases
followups.addFollowupDescription: Add a new follow-up to the system
followups.title: Follow-ups
followups.completeFollowupDescription: Would you like to mark "{{title}}" as completed?
followups.completionNotesPlaceholder: Enter notes about completing this follow-up...
followups.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete "{{title}}"? This action cannot be undone.

caseWorkflows.title: Case Workflows
caseWorkflows.subtitle: Manage workflow templates and stages for different case types
caseWorkflows.name: Workflow Name
caseWorkflows.addWorkflowDescription: Create a new workflow template for case management
caseWorkflows.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the workflow "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

caseWorkflows.noStages: No stages defined. Add your first stage to get started.
caseWorkflows.selectStageToEdit: Select a stage to edit its details
caseWorkflows.estimatedDurationDescription: Expected number of days for this stage
caseWorkflows.autoTransitionDescription: Automatically move to next stage when requirements are met
caseWorkflows.useDefaultStagesDescription: Start with predefined stages for this case category
caseWorkflows.setAsDefaultDescription: Make this the default workflow for this category
caseWorkflows.activeStatusDescription: Active workflows can be assigned to cases

billingRates.activeGroupDescription: Active groups can be assigned to clients and cases

seal.title: Seal Page
seal.description: Sealing a page makes it read-only and creates an audit trail. This is typically used for finalized legal documents.
seal.reasonPlaceholder: e.g., Document finalized for court submission
seal.warning: This action will prevent any further edits to this page.
seal.unsealWarning: Unsealing will allow editing again but the seal history will be preserved.
